textBox.richText: Woke up to a couple inches of fresh pow, and it snowed all day. Dropped Max off at the sharks, then Matthias and I did Outhouse as the warmup. Good stuff! Met up with Alli, Lucille, and Gunter over on the Jane side...Alli was skiing in her "MJ" dress (very cool!!!) Twas windy, so Pano and Eagle Wind were closed. They all stopped for lunch, but I skied through it...they opened the eagle wind trails (even though the lifts were closed), so I had to do a couple old-school laps through there. AWESOME snow back there...I was second-tracks the first time through. Awesome day!!!
